amendment.description: To require a classified report to Congress on the security costs incurred by State and local government law enforcement personnel in each state in complying with requests and requirements of the United States Secret Service to provide protective services and transportation for foreign and domestic officials.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1331 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 79 - 19. Record Vote Number: 292.
